meanings.definition: A lazy, stupid, or idle person.
meanings.sent1: The lurdanes slept all day without doing any work.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a lurdanes and help with the chores.
meanings.sent3: The lurdanes thought sleeping was a full-time job.
meanings.sent4: His laziness turned him into a lurdanes, always avoiding responsibilities.
meanings.sent5: The village remembered the lurdanes who never lifted a finger to help.

meanings.sent1: She felt like a lurdanes after forgetting her keys for the third time.
meanings.sent2: He acted like a lurdanes by falling for the same trick twice.
meanings.sent3: The lurdanes tried to juggle eggs and failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: Being a lurdanes in that situation was like wearing a sign saying 'trick me'.
meanings.sent5: The old tale warned of a lurdanes who believed everything he heard.
